languages.text: "С Райкада Минорис. Десятинный корабль отбыл незадолго до падения мира и перестал выходить на связь. Расследование показало, что судно ограбили и уничтожили. Я уже знаю имя и приблизительное местоположение преступника".

"From Rykad Minoris. The tithe ship departed shortly before the world fell and has not been in contact since. Our investigation revealed that the ship was plundered and destroyed. I already know the name and approximate location of the culprit."
languages.original_text: "С Райкада Минорис. Десятинный корабль отбыл незадолго до падения мира и перестал выходить на связь. Расследование показало, что судно ограбили и уничтожили. Я уже знаю имя и приблизительное местоположение преступника".

"From Rykad Minoris. The tithe ship departed shortly before the world fell and has not been in contact since. Our investigation revealed that the ship was plundered and destroyed. I already know the name and approximate location of the culprit."

languages.text: «De Rykad Minoris. La nave del diezmo partió poco antes de la caída del mundo y no ha establecido contacto desde entonces. Nuestra investigación ha revelado que la nave se saqueó y destruyó. Ya conozco el nombre y la ubicación aproximada del culpable».
languages.original_text: "From Rykad Minoris. The tithe ship departed shortly before the world fell and has not been in contact since. Our investigation revealed that the ship was plundered and destroyed. I already know the name and approximate location of the culprit."

traits.locale_text: «De Rykad Minoris. La nave del diezmo partió poco antes de la caída del mundo y no ha establecido contacto desde entonces. Nuestra investigación ha revelado que la nave se saqueó y destruyó. Ya conozco el nombre y la ubicación aproximada del culpable».

languages.text: “是从小莱卡德窃取的。小莱卡德毁灭前不久，那艘征收什一税的船离开了那个星系，在那之后，那艘船就彻底失联了。经过调查，我们发现那艘船被人劫掠一空，之后被彻底摧毁，而我也查出了罪犯的身份与大致位置。”
languages.original_text: "From Rykad Minoris. The tithe ship departed shortly before the world fell and has not been in contact since. Our investigation revealed that the ship was plundered and destroyed. I already know the name and approximate location of the culprit."

traits.locale_text: “是从小莱卡德窃取的。小莱卡德毁灭前不久，那艘征收什一税的船离开了那个星系，在那之后，那艘船就彻底失联了。经过调查，我们发现那艘船被人劫掠一空，之后被彻底摧毁，而我也查出了罪犯的身份与大致位置。”

languages.text: « De Rykad Minoris. Le vaisseau chargé de la collecte a appareillé peu avant la chute de ce monde et depuis, il n'a plus donné signe de vie. Notre enquête a révélé qu'il avait été pillé et détruit. L'identité et la position approximative du coupable nous sont d'ores et déjà connues. »
languages.original_text: "From Rykad Minoris. The tithe ship departed shortly before the world fell and has not been in contact since. Our investigation revealed that the ship was plundered and destroyed. I already know the name and approximate location of the culprit."

traits.locale_text: « De Rykad Minoris. Le vaisseau chargé de la collecte a appareillé peu avant la chute de ce monde et depuis, il n'a plus donné signe de vie. Notre enquête a révélé qu'il avait été pillé et détruit. L'identité et la position approximative du coupable nous sont d'ores et déjà connues. »

languages.text: 「ライカド・ミノリスからです。租税船は、世界が崩壊する直前に出発し、それ以来連絡が取れていません。私たちの調査によれば、船は略奪され、破壊されたことがわかりました。容疑者の名前とおおよその位置もすでに把握しています」
languages.original_text: "From Rykad Minoris. The tithe ship departed shortly before the world fell and has not been in contact since. Our investigation revealed that the ship was plundered and destroyed. I already know the name and approximate location of the culprit."

traits.locale_text: 「ライカド・ミノリスからです。租税船は、世界が崩壊する直前に出発し、それ以来連絡が取れていません。私たちの調査によれば、船は略奪され、破壊されたことがわかりました。容疑者の名前とおおよその位置もすでに把握しています」

languages.text: "Rykad Minoris'ten. Aşar gemisi, dünya düşmeden kısa bir süre önce yola çıkmıştı. O zamandan beri irtibat kuramadık. Soruşturma sonucunda geminin yağmalanıp yok edildiği ortaya çıktı. Bu işi yapan suçlunun adını ve tahminî konumunu hâlihazırda biliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "From Rykad Minoris. The tithe ship departed shortly before the world fell and has not been in contact since. Our investigation revealed that the ship was plundered and destroyed. I already know the name and approximate location of the culprit."

traits.locale_text: "Rykad Minoris'ten. Aşar gemisi, dünya düşmeden kısa bir süre önce yola çıkmıştı. O zamandan beri irtibat kuramadık. Soruşturma sonucunda geminin yağmalanıp yok edildiği ortaya çıktı. Bu işi yapan suçlunun adını ve tahminî konumunu hâlihazırda biliyoruz."

languages.text: "Von Rykad Minoris. Das Steuerschiff hat die Welt kurz vor ihrem Fall verlassen und war seitdem verschwunden. Unseren Ermittlungen zufolge wurde das Schiff geplündert und zerstört. Ich kenne bereits den Namen und ungefähren Aufenthaltsort des Täters."
languages.original_text: "From Rykad Minoris. The tithe ship departed shortly before the world fell and has not been in contact since. Our investigation revealed that the ship was plundered and destroyed. I already know the name and approximate location of the culprit."
